masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "My parents just told me they're getting divorced. On CHRISTMAS EVE. They're 'trying to be honest about the new year.' I can't—I don't know what to do. Can you come over? I know you're probably busy saving the world but I really need you right now."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Be there for your friend—this is what matters
  • Help them process the news
  • The world can wait—people can't
